name: kitchenowl
description: KitchenOwl is a self hosted grocery list and meal planning app. It manages pantry inventory, shopping lists and recipes, helping households reduce waste and coordinate food buying through shared web and mobile friendly interfaces.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Collaborative grocery lists synced across household members. Coordinate shopping together

features.title: Recipe Management
features.description: Store recipes with ingredients, instructions, and photos. Build your digital cookbook

features.title: Meal Planning
features.description: Plan weekly meals and automatically generate shopping lists. Reduce food waste and save time

features.title: Pantry Inventory
features.description: Track items you have at home with quantities and expiration dates. Know what's in your

features.title: Category Organization
features.description: Organize items by store sections for efficient shopping. Navigate stores systematically

features.title: Barcode Scanning
features.description: Scan product barcodes to quickly add items to lists. Speed up list creation

features.title: Recipe Scaling
features.description: Automatically adjust ingredient quantities for different serving sizes. Cook for any group size

features.title: Shopping History
features.description: Track purchase history and suggest frequently bought items. Simplify repeat shopping
